mapper.select:
select cbue.room_number as room_number,cbu.no as unit_no,cb.no as building_no,cbue.status as estate_status,ur1.name as resident_name,ur1.tel as resident_tel,uao.id,uao.name,uao.weight,ur2.name as applicant_name,ur2.tel as applicant_tel,uao.approach,uao.expected_time,uao.actual_time,uao.export,uao.status,uao.remarks from user_article_out as uao,cpm_building_unit_estate as cbue,user_resident as ur1,user_resident as ur2,cpm_building_unit as cbu,cpm_building as cb
uao.building_unit_estate_id = cbue.id and uao.resident_id = ur1.id and uao.applicant_id = ur2.id and cbue.building_unit_id = cbu.id and cbu.building_id = cb.id
and cbue.room_number like concat('%',#{roomNumber},'%')
and cbu.no like concat('%',#{unitNo},'%')
and cb.no like concat('%',#{buildingNo},'%')
